name: Tap Trap!
description:
Tap & Trap balls to score as many points as possible!

Tap Trap is a free puzzle shooter game.
Easy to play but hard to master, this game is for all ages.

HOW TO PLAY
• Aim and shoot balls
• Try to trap them to score points (with or without bounces)
• Increase your combo (don't miss a shot) and aim for special slot to multiply your score
• Complete an hexagon to restore broken ropes next to it
• Level up to unlock special slots and 'TIME ATTACK' & 'NO SAFETY NET' modes

FEATURES
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy Tap Trap anytime, anywhere!
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY! Suitable for all ages.
• NO penalties or time limits; You can enjoy Tap Trap at your own pace (except for the competitive 'TIME ATTACK' & 'NO SAFETY NET' modes)!
• Unique sessions as special slots are randomly set for each session you play
• IMMERSIVE SOUND FX & GRAPHICS
• LEADERBOARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS

• Tap Trap contains ads like banner, interstitial and rewarded video.

• Designed for iPhone & iPad.
